title: The Wiccan
description: The dark, hollow feeling in Becka’s stomach returned. It was as if she knew something dreadful was just around the corner.Becka Williams joins her friends at a birthday party only to find they’ve invited the enemy. The group heads to a local bookstore to meet the star of The Hex, the hottest show on TV. Becka quickly discovers that the glamour comes with a price as she uncovers lies that defy what she knows to be true.Will Becka speak up for the truth or be spellbound by the allure of the Craft? She must decide before it’s too late…
author: Bill Myers
